content: this handmade crochet accessory a cup cozy features an elegant diamond cable pattern that gives it a beautiful textured finish thanks to its handcrafted and original design it not only protects your hands from hot beverages but also adds a stylish touch to your favorite cup it s the perfect gift for a coffee lover this crochet accessory is also a great eco-friendly gift option as it helps reduce the use of disposable cups skill level easy / intermediate size 20 oz venti /591 ml cup finished width 3 in 7 5 cm finished length 10 5 in 26 5 cm technical details - yarn worsted #4 100% cotton 23 g 35 m / 39 yds - hook us g-6 4 0 mm - instructions written + chart / photo tutorials - language en / us-terms when you download my patterns directly from my official shops ravelry or my website you get free updates if the pattern is revised or improved direct support from the designer in case you have questions high-quality files with clear photos and instructions and most importantly you re supporting an independent designer
